thread.title: People Can’t Stop Laughing At Trudeau’s Awkward Reaction To Trump’s Handshake
thread.title_full: People Can’t Stop Laughing At Trudeau’s Awkward Reaction To Trump’s Handshake

author: Robert Anthony
title: People Can’t Stop Laughing At Trudeau’s Awkward Reaction To Trump’s Handshake
text:
Let’s take a closer look… REUTERS Based on Trump’s history of awkward handshakes, most of us would likely react the same way. 
— Simon Gosden (@SimonGosden) February 13, 2017 You just never know if you’re going to get your arm back or not. alapoet: RT ErickFernandez: This handshake between Trump and Neil Gorsuch is so freaking weird. pic.twitter.com/OkhBSxPG7M 
— Ken Kirk (DocReefer) (@Kenlenkirk) February 8, 2017 Just ask Japanese PM Shinzō Abe… BREAKING: Japanese PM tells President Trump "please, you hurt me" during awkward handshake. pic.twitter.com/d9fpLaVSJy Eventually, Trudeau gave in and shook President Trump’s hand. It actually turned out to be one of Trump’s calmer handshakes. Trudeau looking confident only shook Trump's hand for 2.5 seconds. pic.twitter.com/feK97FxAoG 
— Maximiliano (@alldaymax1) February 13, 2017 Judging by their very first handshake, though, it almost seems like Trudeau knew he had to match Trump’s aggressive approach. This is priceless. Trump goes in for the signature jackass handshake but Trudeau is all "no, I am the alpha here." pic.twitter.com/PjJQi1T4nI 
— HawaiiDelilah (@HawaiiDelilah) February 13, 2017 
Overall, it seems like everything went smoothly during Trudeau’s welcoming to the White House. 
Not only did he get his hand back in under three seconds, without having to sacrifice his arm, he also managed to create a meme-worthy moment the internet will never forget. 
— Ariane Bellamar (@ArianeBellamar) February 13, 2017 
On top of that, it seems like someone in Trump’s corner might’ve told him to loosen up on the handshakes and leave that kind of grip back on the golf course. 
At least for the sake of world leaders’ limbs, we hope so! Social Media Expert Breaks Down Trump's Twitter To view this video please enable JavaScript, and considerupgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video
